betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The Arcane Maneuvering Device is a useful prop for exploring the map, right-click to throw its grappling hook portion and it will be sucked up by any square it touches within range, but with a maximum range the grappling hook will return straight back. You can replace other items in the item bar after hooking, it will not affect the grappling hook's adsorption, press shift to release the grappling hook. 

This item needs to be energized before it can be used.
betterquesting:10.name:8: leap onto roofs and vault over walls (usually associated with martial arts)
